name: entertainment-hub-monorepo
description: Micro-frontends architecture for entertainment listing platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shell" "npm run dev:viewer" "npm run dev:manager"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/shell && npm install && cd ../public-viewer && npm install && cd ../content-manager && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd apps/shell && npm run build && cd ../public-viewer && npm run build && cd ../content-manager && npm run build
